translation.en: Jake, finally.
Oh! Eileen, hello! I thought you were my brother.
translation.es: ¡Eileen! Hola. Pensé que era mi hermano.

translation.en: Is Jake making you do all the work again?
translation.es: ¿Jake te puso a cargo de todo el trabajo?

translation.en: Oh, no.
Jake has been banned from the kitchen since junior high
translation.es: Jake tiene prohibido entrar a la cocina.

translation.en: when he almost burned it down making gumdrops.
translation.es: Una vez casi la prendió fuego.

translation.en: He enjoys the operational side. You can't overboil numbers.
translation.es: Ahora es administrador. No puedes incendiar números.

translation.en: No, you can't.
I'll have my usual.
Okay, three mint meltaways.
Oh! And here is a salted coconut caramel buttercream for you to try.
translation.es: Y prueba este dulce de crema de coco y caramelo con sal.

translation.en: -Ooh! You are a dear. -You're gonna like that.
Oh! I also need to pre-order two boxes of toffee for my grandson.
translation.es: Necesito ordenar dos cajas de tofi para mi nieto.

translation.en: Okay.
Two boxes, you got it.
-[register chimes] -When does Megan get home?
I was hoping for Winterfest,
but she's studying in Luxembourg so probably not till summer.
translation.es: pero ella estudia en Luxemburgo. Vendrá en el verano.

translation.en: What a smart world traveler you've raised.
translation.es: Tu hija es tan inteligente y aventurera.

translation.en: She didn't get it from me. I am such a homebody.
translation.es: No lo sacó de mí. Yo siempre me quedo en casa.

translation.en: See you next week.
-Don't forget your chocolate. -Ooh! Thanks.
-You're late. -Sorry, ma'am.
-Come on! -Sorry.
I know, I'm late getting this to you, but I was talking to Ophelia--
translation.es: Lo sé. Es tarde para traer esto. Hablé con Ophelia…

translation.en: It's okay, I'm just glad you're here.
We have so much to do before Winterfest and I…
translation.es: Tenemos mucho para hacer antes del festival.

translation.en: Jake, are you all right?
Oh, great.
-Yeah, but, um… -But what?
Hey, are you free for dinner tonight?
Should I be worried?
No, not really.
That's not reassuring.
How about 7:30?
Kerrie, Jake, hello, hello.
-Hi. -How is everything?
It is delicious as always. Thank you, Adam.
-You outdid yourself with the crab cakes. -I'm glad you like it.
translation.es: - Te has superado con la tarta de cangrejo - Me alegra.

translation.en: I still need to come by and place my candy order for Winterfest.
translation.es: Tengo que hacer mi orden de dulces para el festival.

translation.en: Is Alexandra working this week?
I believe she is.
Great.
-Enjoy your meals. -Thank you.
So, not that I don't enjoy being treated to dinner by my big brother,
translation.es: Me alegra que mi hermano mayor me haya invitado a cenar,

translation.en: but can you please tell me what's going on right now?
translation.es: pero, por favor, ¿puedes decirme qué sucede?

translation.en: Okay.
So…
Ophelia got offered her dream job teaching English literature in London.
translation.es: A Ophelia le ofrecieron enseñar Literatura inglesa en Londres.

translation.en: She's beyond ecstatic.
I couldn't be happier for her.
Jake, that's fantastic!
You are such a supportive husband.
It's too bad Ophelia couldn't be with us tonight to celebrate.
translation.es: Qué pena que Ophelia no haya venido a celebrar.

translation.en: And how perfect that London is less than a 30-minute drive from here.
translation.es: Y Londres es perfecto. Queda a 30 minutos de aquí.

translation.en: Not London, Ohio.
London, England.
Silchester University.
She accepted a job in England?
One of their professors left unexpectedly so Ophelia flew out early this morning.
translation.es: Uno de los profesores se fue. Ophelia tomó su vuelo esta mañana.

translation.en: She wanted to tell you herself, but there wasn't time.
translation.es: Quería contártelo, pero no hubo tiempo.

translation.en: I can't… What about the store?
translation.es: No puedo… ¿Y qué pasará con la tienda?

translation.en: I can't run it alone.
Especially with Winterfest coming up.
translation.es: El festival es dentro de poco.

translation.en: There aren't enough hours in the day for me to do everything myself.
translation.es: El día no alcanza para todo lo que hay que hacer.

translation.en: That's what I wanted to talk to you about.
I've been thinking about long-term solutions,
translation.es: Estuve pensando en soluciones a largo plazo

translation.en: and the best one might be for me to sell my half of the business.
translation.es: y lo mejor para mí es vender mi parte del negocio.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I know how you feel about change, and this is a lot of news all at once.
translation.es: Perdón. Sé lo que piensas de los cambios y todo esto es demasiado.

translation.en: But, in a major stroke of luck for both of us,
translation.es: Pero tenemos un golpe de suerte extraordinario.

translation.en: there's an interested buyer who we both already know.
translation.es: Hay un interesado. Tú también lo conoces.

translation.en: -Who? -Brooks McLead.
Wait, what?
He's a financial genius and extremely successful entrepreneur.
translation.es: Es un genio de las finanzas y un emprendedor exitoso.

translation.en: It's a gift that he wants to buy into our family shop.
translation.es: Es una bendición que quiera comprar nuestro negocio.

translation.en: -No, not happening. -Why not?
translation.es: - No. No lo hará. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: Because I remember what he was like in high school, that's why not.
translation.es: Porque recuerdo cómo era en la secundaria. Por eso.

translation.en: Kerrie, that was a long time ago.
translation.es: Kerrie, eso fue hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Look, I'm going to be in the UK for the next five years and…
translation.es: Mira, estaré en el Reino Unido los próximos cinco años.

translation.en: Five years?
Gosh, Jake, I'm really gonna miss you.
translation.es: Dios, Jake. En verdad voy a extrañarte.

translation.en: You should come with us. We'd love to have you.
I mean, you've lived your entire life in Bedford.
translation.es: Has vivido toda tu vida en Bedford.

translation.en: We could sell the shop.
Every memory I have of Mom and Dad and Nanny and Pop
translation.es: Todos los recuerdos que tengo de mamá, papá, la abuela y el abuelo

translation.en: center around the shop.
Mom and Nanny taught me how to pour the candy molds.
translation.es: Mamá y la abuela me enseñaron a usar los moldes.

translation.en: You painted the sign outside with Pop.
translation.es: Tú pintaste el letrero con el abuelo.

translation.en: It's our family's legacy, it's our history.
translation.es: Es nuestro legado familiar. Es nuestra historia.

translation.en: This is my home, Jake.
Listen, I know that Brooks wasn't your favorite person back then. That's an understatement.
translation.es: - Escucha, sé que Brooks no te caía bien. - No me caía para nada bien.

translation.en: But he's incredibly competent, smart, trustworthy.
translation.es: Pero él es muy competente, inteligente y confiable.

translation.en: And his businesses always double or triple their profits.
translation.es: Sus negocios siempre duplican o triplican en ganancias.

translation.en: I want you to have a nice nest egg to retire on one day.
translation.es: Quiero que ahorres dinero para cuando quieras retirarte.

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying this, but…
translation.es: No puedo creer que vaya a decir esto,

translation.en: okay.
You can sell your half of the store to Brooks McLead.
translation.es: Puedes venderle tu parte a Brooks McLead.

translation.en: You won't regret this.
How are you settling in?
Eh, better than the last place.
Why can't your next venture be in Hawaii or Florida?
translation.es: ¿Podría tu próxima empresa estar en Hawái o en Florida?

translation.en: Yeah? You can move us there?
Brooks, whatever happened to that job in Silicon Valley?
translation.es: Brooks, ¿qué sucedió con aquel trabajo en Silicon Valley?

translation.en: -Check. -Turned it down.
After everything that happened in New York, I thought…
translation.es: Después de lo de Nueva York, pensé…

translation.en: just wanted a quieter life.
The Bay Area retirement community,
translation.es: La comunidad de retirados de Bay Area…

translation.en: they had ocean views
and they offered surfing excursions.
translation.es: Y hacen excursiones por lugares de surf.

translation.en: -Just no comparison. -Sorry, Dad.
translation.es: - No tiene comparación. - Lo siento, papá.

translation.en: Listen, you know you can always move in with me if you'd like.
translation.es: Escucha, sabes que puedes mudarte conmigo.

translation.en: -You don't have to live here. -Oh!
Does your house have luxurious amenities,
decadent dining, daily activities,
an organized social events calendar?
That's a really good point. I should move in here instead.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Yo debería mudarme aquí.

translation.en: What, and cramp my style? I don't think so.
translation.es: ¿Y meterte en mi vida? No lo creo.

translation.en: That's it, check.
You know, I'm just hoping that one day, you'll just settle down permanently.
translation.es: Sabes, espero que un día logres asentarte en algún lugar.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be around forever to take care of you.
translation.es: No estaré aquí para siempre para cuidar de ti.

translation.en: I tried it, Dad, didn't work.
Sierra wasn't the right one for you.
translation.es: Sierra no era la indicada para ti.

translation.en: Could have let me know that earlier, would have saved me a lot of grief.
translation.es: Podrías habérmelo dicho. No hubiera sufrido tanto.

translation.en: You wouldn't have listened, you're too stubborn.
You always will try to learn it the hard way.
translation.es: Siempre aprendes las cosas por las malas.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
Checkmate.
-Rematch? -No, I gotta go.
I gotta sign papers with the lawyer and Jake.
translation.es: Firmaré papeles con Jake y el abogado.

translation.en: Rain check?
Yeah.
I love you, Dad.
I love you too, son.
I can't believe Jake and Ophelia are moving to England.
translation.es: Jake y Ophelia vivirán en Inglaterra. Increíble.

translation.en: I know. And the timing couldn't be worse, with Winterfest coming up.
translation.es: Lo sé. Y es un muy mal momento. El festival es dentro de poco.

translation.en: I haven't even told Megan. I don't want her to worry.
translation.es: No se lo he dicho a Megan. No quiero que se preocupe.

translation.en: I just want her to enjoy her semester abroad.
translation.es: Quiero que disfrute de vivir en otro país.

translation.en: You're such a good mom.
Thanks. And thank you for coming on board full time.
translation.es: Te agradezco. Y gracias por venir a ayudarme.

translation.en: We are going to be working around the clock to get all this done.
translation.es: Vamos a trabajar mucho para lograr tener todo listo.

translation.en: [Alexandra] I am happy to help.
One of our biggest events and we already have more orders than last year.
translation.es: Es un evento importante. Ya tenemos muchos pedidos.

translation.en: And less than two weeks to fill them. And I will gladly pay you double overtime.
translation.es: Y menos de dos semanas para prepararlos. Te pagaré las horas extras.

translation.en: That's very generous.
So, when does your new business partner start?
Oh, they're signing the paperwork right now.
translation.es: Están firmando los papeles en este momento.

translation.en: I'm so glad this worked out.
I'm really excited to be a part of it. Perfect timing too.
translation.es: Estoy muy contento. Es un buen momento.

translation.en: You sure you're not going to miss the city?
translation.es: ¿Seguro no vas a extrañar la ciudad?

translation.en: No. I'm through with it there. Looking for a change of scenery now.
translation.es: No. Ya no es para mí. Estoy buscando un cambio.

translation.en: Yeah.
Now this is taken care of, you wanna get a drink, celebrate?
Yeah, yeah. It's got to be quick. I need to get back for the movers.
translation.es: Sí. Algo rápido. Debo seguir organizando la mudanza.

translation.en: -Oh, you're coming tonight? -Yeah, of course.
That reminds me, I still need to place my candy order.
translation.es: Eso me recuerda que tengo que ordenar mis dulces.

translation.en: For you or your customers?
For my customers, of course.
Unless I eat them all first.
translation.es: A menos que me los coma todos.

translation.en: -Which is what usually happens. -Can't say I blame you.
translation.es: - Algo que sucede a menudo. - No puedo culparte por eso.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm surprised Brooks isn't here yet.
translation.es: ¡ALLÁ VAMOS! Qué raro que Brooks no haya llegado.

translation.en: You invited him tonight?
No, you can just forward any of my mail to my new address in Ohio.
translation.es: No. Puedes enviar mi correo a mi nueva dirección en Ohio.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I hope I made the right decision too.
translation.es: Sí, espero haber tomado una buena decisión.

translation.en: Okay.
-Hey! -Brooks, I'm glad you made it.
translation.es: - Hola. - Me alegra que estés aquí.

translation.en: Thanks for having me.
I got you something.
I think I'm gonna appreciate this more than I know.
translation.es: Lo disfrutaré más de lo que piensas.

translation.en: I heard they only drink the tea over there, matey.
translation.es: Escuché que allí solo toman té, amigo.

translation.en: Oh, hey, you remember my sister, Kerrie?
Your new business partner.
-Hi. -[Brooks] Hi.
-Long time. -Long time.
It's nice to see you again, Bean.
Can I talk to you outside?
-Yeah, sure. -Excuse us.
Yeah, see you soon.
I've changed my mind about the partnership.
All he did was walk in the door.
translation.es: Lo único que hizo fue entrar.

translation.en: He called me Bean!
Well, I mean, you did fail miserably at your attempt to create a jalapeño hot sauce jellybean.
translation.es: Fallaste cuando quisiste elaborar dulces picantes y con forma de frijol.

translation.en: Oh, come on, you know that was my experimental candy phase!
translation.es: Sabes que era mi etapa experimental.

translation.en: I know. I think I still have a hole in the roof of my mouth from it.
translation.es: Lo sé. Creo que aún tengo un agujero en el paladar.

translation.en: That man made my life miserable in high school.
translation.es: Ese hombre fue malo conmigo en el secundario.

translation.en: It'll be better if I take a home equity loan and do everything myself.
translation.es: Será mejor sacar otro préstamo y hacerlo sola.

translation.en: That man uprooted his life to move here to help us.
translation.es: Él cambió su vida para mudarse aquí y ayudarnos.

translation.en: But if you really want me to, I'll ask him to nullify the contract
translation.es: Si en verdad es lo que quieres, le pediré la anulación del contrato

translation.en: and I'll refund him the payment.
What about that little cottage you were thinking about buying?
translation.es: Pero estabas pensando en comprar una cabaña.

translation.en: Don't worry about that.
There are other places that Ophelia and I can rent.
translation.es: Con Ophelia, podemos alquilar otros lugares.

translation.en: Kerrie, I didn't want you to be financially strapped by taking out a loan.
translation.es: Kerrie, no quería que tengas problemas de dinero por sacar un préstamo.

translation.en: That's why I thought Brooks was the perfect solution for both of us.
translation.es: Por eso pensé que Brooks sería la solución perfecta para ambos.

translation.en: But we'll figure something else out.
Okay. Okay, I might be overreacting.
It's probably just the shock of seeing him again.
translation.es: Debe ser por el impacto de volver a verlo.

translation.en: But you're right, high school was a long time ago.
translation.es: Pero tienes razón. Pasó mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I'll give it a try. But if it doesn't work out…
Then you can take out that home equity loan
and you can buy him out.
If it doesn't work out, I will.
It's a good thing you're moving so far away.
translation.es: Por suerte te vas muy lejos.

translation.en: -You will thank me for this one day. -Don't count on it.
translation.es: - Algún día me lo agradecerás. - No lo creo.

translation.en: Come on, let's go back in and enjoy
this wonderful going-away party that you organized for me.
translation.es: de esta maravillosa fiesta de despedida que organizaste.

translation.en: Fine.
I can't believe Brooks McLead is my business partner.
translation.es: No puedo creer que Brooks McLead es mi socio.

translation.en: -Have you heard from Jake? -Oh, yeah.
He arrived safely and he's getting settled into their new place.
translation.es: Llegaron bien y ya están en su nueva casa.

translation.en: -So far, they love Silchester. -Good.
translation.es: - Les ha gustado Silchester. - Qué bien.

translation.en: So how do you know Brooks again?
High school. He and Jake were two years ahead of me.
translation.es: Del secundario. Él y Jake me llevaban dos años.

translation.en: Oh, you were all friends?
I wouldn't say that.
Brooks was always at our house, but he just teased me relentlessly.
translation.es: Brooks siempre estaba en casa. Me molestaba todo el tiempo.

translation.en: He was always picking on me.
I couldn't stand to be in the same room with him.
translation.es: No soportaba estar cerca de él.

translation.en: A bully?
No, nothing like that.
You know, he just was popular and athletic, handsome.
translation.es: Ya sabes, él era popular, deportista, apuesto.

translation.en: You know, that type.
I swear, I was the only girl in school that didn't treat him like royalty.
translation.es: Yo era la única chica que no lo trataba como si fuera un rey.

translation.en: -No wonder he liked you. -What?!
Though there was that time…
What?
Oh, nothing. It's such a long time ago. It's meaningless now.
translation.es: Nada. Fue hace mucho. No significa nada ahora.

translation.en: Okay.
It was his senior year, he was hanging out at our house waiting for Jake,
translation.es: Era su último año. Él estaba esperando a Jake.

translation.en: eating everything in the kitchen, I might add.
And he mentioned that he didn't have a date for the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.es: Y mencionó que no tenía una cita para el Baile de Invierno.

translation.en: What happened?
Well, he said he would have a better time going with me than any of the other girls in school.
translation.es: Bueno, dijo que prefería ir conmigo que con cualquier otra chica.

translation.en: Okay, maybe I didn't dislike him as much as I thought I did back then.
translation.es: Está bien. Quizás no me caía tan mal como creía.

translation.en: I thought he meant what he said.
translation.es: Pensé que lo decía en serio.

translation.en: I thought I was his date.
translation.es: Pensé que yo era su cita.

translation.en: The night of the dance, he never showed up.
translation.es: No pasó a buscarme la noche del baile.

translation.en: Come to find out he took Erin Smythe, captain of the cheerleaders, instead.
translation.es: Supe que fue con Erin Smythe, la capitana de las porristas.

translation.en: Oh, no.
Did he have any idea that you thought he'd asked you?
Probably not.
I don't know. I avoided talking to him after that.
translation.es: No lo sé. No quise volver a hablarle después de eso.

translation.en: And then he moved after graduation.
translation.es: Y él se mudó después de la graduación.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
It must have been devastating to your sweet little teenage heart.
translation.es: Debe haber sido muy duro para tu corazón adolescente.

translation.en: Well, it was at the time.
translation.es: Sí, lo fue en ese entonces.

translation.en: Now, I just hope he remains a silent partner that stays--
translation.es: Espero que no se involucre mucho en el negocio.

translation.en: [Brooks] Hello!
Or not.
Oh, hi!
Good morning.
All right, ready to get started.
Jake used to bring me here all the time.
This is like my favorite place.
Your parents were always so nice to me.
translation.es: Tus padres eran muy amables conmigo.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Um, I just thought I would promote some of the higher-priced products by putting them in the customers' eyeline.
translation.es: Quiero poner los productos más caros a la vista para promocionarlos.

translation.en: I'm not manipulating my customers into buying anything they don't want.
translation.es: No manipulo a mis clientes para comprar algo que no quieran.

translation.en: I think you mean our customers.
I'm not interested in manipulating them either,
but they can't buy what they can't see.
translation.es: No comprarán algo que no ven.

translation.en: The average shopper makes three unplanned or impulse purchases
translation.es: El comprador promedio hace tres compras impulsivas o no planeadas

translation.en: on four out of every ten store visits.
Let me guess, you're upping the odds?
Exactly.
So… do you think we could move the cash register over the candy counter?
translation.es: ¿Crees que podríamos mover la caja registradora al mostrador?

translation.en: What do you know about candy making?
Absolutely nothing. Although candy is my favorite food group.
translation.es: En absoluto, pero me gustan mucho.

translation.en: -It's a bad idea. -What's that?
Oh, I said, "I have an idea."
We need to get a raffle prize for Winterfest.
translation.es: Necesitamos un premio para el sorteo.

translation.en: All the vendors donate something,
and then the money raised goes to the local schools' arts programs.
translation.es: Lo recaudado es para programas de arte de las escuelas.

translation.en: I can take care of that.
Great. Thank you.
Oh! Hello, young man. What's your name?
-James. -James, are you here alone?
No. My mom is shopping next door.
translation.es: Mi mamá está en la tienda de al lado.

translation.en: How can I help you?
I want to get one for my mom, one for Nana, and one for Lily.
translation.es: Quiero uno para mi mamá, uno para mi abuela y otro para Lily.

translation.en: Aren't you a sweetheart! Is Lily your sister?
translation.es: Qué dulce eres. ¿Lily es tu hermana?

translation.en: No. She's my girlfriend.
She's a girl and she's my best friend.
translation.es: Es una chica y es mi mejor amiga.

translation.en: Okay, I see you have your piggybank.
translation.es: Está bien. Veo que traes tus ahorros.

translation.en: Wow!
[boy] Ten…
[Kerrie] Yeah.
Do I have enough?
You have the exact right amount.
Here you go, my friend.
And this is a little something extra for you.
translation.es: Y esto es algo extra para ti.

translation.en: You got everything?
All right, hang on, let me get the door for you.
You go straight to your mom, okay?
-Thanks. Bye. -Bye, honey.
What a cutie pie!
Very cute.
Out of curiosity, how much free product do you give away each month?
translation.es: Solo por curiosidad. ¿Cuántos productos regalas por mes?

translation.en: -I don't know, I've never counted. -Oh.
translation.es: No lo sé. Nunca los conté.

translation.en: -Is that a problem? -Uh, I hope not.
Brooks, you remember Alexandra from Jake's going-away party?
translation.es: Brooks, ¿recuerdas a Alexandra de la fiesta?

translation.en: Yeah, of course. Hello. How are you?
Hi. Busy! Winterfest is ten days away.
translation.es: Hola. Muy ocupada. El festival es en diez días.

translation.en: Yeah. So glad it's still a tradition.
translation.es: Sí. Me alegra que se celebre.

translation.en: I have some very fun memories from Winterfest.
Oh, it gets bigger every year.
It used to be a couple of hours after the student dance,
translation.es: Duraba unas pocas horas luego del baile,

translation.en: now it's a full day and evening event for the entire community.
translation.es: pero ahora es un evento de todo el día.

translation.en: Oh! Excuse me.
Hi, honey.
Um, does she clock out to take personal calls?
Alexandra helps take care of her five-year-old niece,
translation.es: Alexandra cuida de su sobrina de cinco años.

translation.en: so she can take a personal call whenever she needs to
for however long she needs to without punching a clock.
translation.es: y hablar el tiempo que quiera sin que se le descuente el tiempo.

translation.en: Okay, just getting to know your modus operandi.
translation.es: Está bien. Solo quiero conocer tu estilo.

translation.en: We are a family owned and operated business.
Our M.O. is we treat everyone like family.
translation.es: así que tratamos a todos como familia.

translation.en: Good. Good to know.
Listen, are you free to get together for lunch, discuss our business plan?
translation.es: Escucha, ¿vamos a almorzar juntos así vemos el plan de negocios?

translation.en: Oh, I can't, I'm really busy.
What about dinner?
You have to eat at some point of the day, don't you?
translation.es: Tienes que comer en algún momento del día.

translation.en: Okay. Dinner.
A quick dinner.
-Quick dinner. -Mm-hmm.
Great, I'll make a reservation. Anywhere you like.
translation.es: Genial. Haré reservaciones donde tú quieras.

translation.en: -Adam's Eatery is fine. -Okay.
translation.es: - El restaurante de Adam está bien. - Bueno.

translation.en: Say 5 p.m.?
-Five is fine. -Excellent.
Hey, hey! Hey, sorry I'm late.
I got caught on a call for a different business venture.
I understand that happens, and it's not a problem,
translation.es: Entiendo que eso pasa y no hay problema,

translation.en: but any time you're gonna be 15 minutes late,
translation.es: pero, si vas a llegar 15 minutos tarde,

translation.en: a text would be appreciated.
You're right. That was rude of me not to text you.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Fui descortés al no avisarte.

translation.en: I apologize.
Thank you.
I don't know if you remember, but this used to be Margolita's.
translation.es: No sé si recuerdas, pero esto era Margolita's.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Sanchez retired.
Oh, that's too bad. I like this place.
translation.es: Qué mal. Me gustaba ese lugar.

translation.en: -They had the best chips and salsa. -You're right, they did.
translation.es: - Vendían los mejores bocadillos. - Es verdad.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Adam took over several years ago.
translation.es: - Sí. - Adam es el dueño hace muchos años.

translation.en: He is really the best chef in town.

Sorry. Okay, thanks.
-Ooh! -I didn't-- I got it.
[clears throat] Yeah.
-Sorry. -Yeah, that's okay.

Okay. I went through the shop's entire history.

translation.en: Oh. You're thorough.
Uh-huh. Before I buy any business, I do all the research.

translation.en: Well, they did bring their candy making secrets over from Europe.

translation.en: Here's a list of things I think we should consider implementing.

translation.en: The business is not in trouble, but we could be doing a lot better.
translation.es: El negocio no tiene problemas, pero nos podría ir mejor.

translation.en: "Change name to Murphy & McLead Candy & Gift shop"?
translation.es: PLAN DE NEGOCIOS ¿"Tienda de dulces y regalos Murphy y McLead"?

translation.en: [chuckles] No. No, absolutely not.
[laughs] You're right, that's a bad idea.
I think it's important to preserve the original brand name,
translation.es: Es importante conservar el nombre original.

translation.en: not necessarily change it.
You're right.
"Create an employee handbook"?
We only have one full-time employee.
For now, but what if we expand or franchise?

translation.en: It's important to have everything in writing.
That way, there aren't a lot of miscommunications.

translation.en: You're very by-the-book, aren't you?
I'm a businessman, that's what I know.
Candy, good candy, makes people happy.
translation.es: Los dulces, los buenos dulces, hacen feliz a la gente.

translation.en: That was my great grandparents' mission, and it's mine too.
translation.es: Ese era el objetivo de mis bisabuelos y también es el mío.

translation.en: That's what I know.
I admire that, I really do.
And my purpose is to create more profit. That's for all of our sakes.
translation.es: Mi objetivo es generar más ganancias y que sean para el bien de todos.

translation.en: How is everything here?
-Oh. -Good.
Fabulous, thank you.
The roast sirloin rivals anything I've ever had in New York City.

translation.en: I'll gladly take that compliment.
Good to see you. Give Alexandra my best.
translation.es: Me alegra verte. Saluda a Alexandra por mí.

translation.en: I will. [clears throat]
Well…
I thank you for dinner.
As much as I would like to stick around and discuss
translation.es: Por más que quiera quedarme a hablar

translation.en: marketing strategies and new signage,
translation.es: de estrategias de marketing y cosas nuevas,

translation.en: I need to get back to my candy molds.
Because without them, we won't have a business.
translation.es: Sin los dulces, no tenemos negocio.

translation.en: -Let me get the check. -Oh, no, I've got it. That's fine.
translation.es: - Pediré la cuenta. - Yo me encargo. Está bien.

translation.en: Thank you.
It's a business expense so it's a write-off.
translation.es: Va a la cuenta de la tienda.

translation.en: Right.
-Hey. -Hey, morning.
You're here early.
As Ben Franklin says,
"Early to bed, early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise."
translation.es: "Si te duermes y levantas temprano, serás sano, rico, sabio".

translation.en: Where does that leave the artist who finds their creativity at night?
translation.es: ¿Y qué pasa con los artistas que son creativos de noche?

translation.en: It's a really good point.
Speaking of creativity, I want you to look at our new website.
translation.es: Hablando de creatividad, quiero que veas nuestro nuevo sitio.

translation.en: What was wrong with our old website?
No, nothing. I just wanted to run a few ideas by you.
translation.es: No, para nada. Solo quería mostrarte algunas ideas.

translation.en: Where's the picture of my great grandparents?
It's right here, I moved it to the history page.
translation.es: Está aquí, en la sección Historia.

translation.en: -You changed the logo?! -No, those are just options.
translation.es: - ¿Cambiaste el logo? - No. Solo son algunas opciones.

translation.en: You could see them in case you liked any of them.
-You don't waste any time. -No, wasted time, wasted profit.
translation.es: - Todo tan rápido. - Tiempo perdido, dinero perdido.

translation.en: -Did Ben Franklin say that too? -No, that was me.
translation.es: - ¿Ben Franklin decía eso? - No. Lo digo yo.

translation.en: I've always been partial to "don't fix what isn't broken."
translation.es: Creo que no hay que arreglar algo que así está bien.

translation.en: You'd be amazed what a great website
and a strong social media presence does for a business.
translation.es: y presencia en redes darán buenos resultados.

translation.en: -We need to expand our reach. -Brooks, I don't have time for this.
translation.es: - Tenemos que expandirnos. - Brooks, no tengo tiempo.

translation.en: That's what I'm here for.
Right.
Okay. Anything else?
We could offer free Wi-Fi, then, after the Winterfest, open a coffee bar in here
translation.es: Podemos ofrecer internet gratis y abrir una cafetería aquí.

translation.en: so people can come in and hang out.
translation.es: La gente vendría y se quedaría.

translation.en: Actually, that's not a bad idea. And a hot chocolate bar.
translation.es: No es una mala idea. Y un puesto de chocolate caliente.

translation.en: I've been working with this new drink called a "hot cocoa bomb."
translation.es: Podré vender mi "Bomba de chocolate caliente".

translation.en: [Brooks] I'm not sure we have enough space.
We might have to knock down a few walls, expand a little bit.
translation.es: Tendremos que derribar algunas paredes. Expandirnos.

translation.en: Maybe find new premises?
No, I'm not knocking down walls. Or moving.
translation.es: No. No derribaré paredes ni me mudaré.

translation.en: After we expand, we have to outsource the candy-making to a factory.
translation.es: Además, una fábrica deberá encargarse de la producción.

translation.en: -What? -This will be our flagship store.
If we invest in it, it's gonna be fine. This font is driving me crazy.
translation.es: Si invertimos, irá bien. Este tipo de letra no me gusta.

translation.en: Fine, you work on the font, I'm gonna open the shop.
translation.es: Está bien. Ocúpate de la letra. Abriré la tienda.

translation.en: Are you emailing Megan?
Yes. I'm filling her in on what's happening around here,
translation.es: Sí. Le estoy contando las novedades.

translation.en: how Brooks wants to change the name of the shop, change the logo,
translation.es: Que Brooks quiere cambiar nuestro nombre, el logo,

translation.en: knock the walls down and expand. You know he wants to find a factory to make the candy?
translation.es: quiere derribar paredes y hasta tercerizar la producción.

translation.en: Yeah, he's… very enthusiastic.
And presumptuous, and as arrogant as ever.
translation.es: Sigue siendo el mismo arrogante de siempre.

translation.en: I told Jake I'd give this a try, but it just isn't working.
translation.es: Le dije a Jake que lo haría. No está funcionando.

translation.en: Isn't it too late now?
We'll see about that.
So you own half of Murphy's Candies & Gifts.
translation.es: Es dueña de parte de Dulces y Regalos Murphy.

translation.en: Yes.
To make sure I'm clear, you want to buy out this new partner you told me about?
translation.es: Quiere comprar la parte de su nuevo socio.

translation.en: That's my plan.
And what do you have as collateral on a loan?
I don't have much savings, but I do have my family home.
translation.es: No tengo ahorros, pero tengo la casa de mi familia.

translation.en: My parents put it in my name before they passed.
translation.es: Mis padres la pusieron a mi nombre.

translation.en: I'm sorry for your loss.
-And the house is fully paid off? -Yes.
I wanted to inquire about a home equity loan.
I always recommend a home equity loan over using your house as collateral.
translation.es: Recomiendo sacar un préstamo en lugar de poner la casa en garantía.

translation.en: You have a solid credit rating and no debt.
translation.es: Tiene buena calificación crediticia. Sin deudas.

translation.en: Let me see what I can do, and hopefully he won't be your partner much longer.
translation.es: Veré qué puedo hacer. Con suerte, él dejará de ser su socio.

translation.en: I'm really sorry, but your ex-husband didn't sign a quitclaim.
translation.es: Lo siento. Su exmarido no firmó la renuncia.

translation.en: You're gonna have to get him to sign one to clear the title.
translation.es: Deberá pedirle que la firme para seguir.

translation.en: Oh, no, I thought he signed that.
translation.es: Pensé que ya la había firmado.

translation.en: Well, that's gonna take some time.
According to my daughter, he's in some remote part of Mexico
translation.es: Según mi hija, él está en México.

translation.en: working for the next six months.
Oh, no!
This means I'm stuck with that obnoxious, controlling, egoist for a business partner!
translation.es: No tengo opción. Deberé aguantar a ese socio odioso, controlador y egoísta.

translation.en: -[ball rattles in hole] -Okay, this is it.
-You cheatin', kid? -It's putting, how could I cheat?
Hey, where is my chocolate?
You own half of the best candy store in town, don't you?
translation.es: Eres uno de los dueños de la mejor tienda de dulces.

translation.en: Sorry, yeah, I forgot. Next time.
translation.es: Perdona. Sí. Lo olvidé. Los traeré la próxima vez.

translation.en: -What's the matter? Something wrong? -Nah, it's…
It's not going as smoothly as expected.
Well, unlike you, most people resist change.
translation.es: Algunas personas no quieren cambios. No son como tú.

translation.en: Yeah, but all I'm trying to do is turn a bigger profit, that helps everybody.
translation.es: Sí. Solo quiero generar más ganancias que ayudarán a todos.

translation.en: And everything I suggest, everything, upsets her.
translation.es: Y no le gustan mis propuestas. Ninguna.

translation.en: It's a dilemma.
Oh! Did you see that?
Nice shot, Dad.
It's like your mother used to say, "There's a lid for every pot."
translation.es: Tu madre decía: "Siempre hay un roto para un descosido".

translation.en: What's that got to do with anything?
She also used to say that, "At the end, it's people, not things, that matter."
translation.es: También decía: "Lo que importa son las personas y no las cosas".

translation.en: And what do you say?
Well, I say that… maybe you should look at the situation
translation.es: Bueno. Pienso que quizá tendrías que ver la situación

translation.en: from your new partner's point of view, instead of just your own.
translation.es: desde el punto de vista de tu socia.

translation.en: Okay.
From Kerrie's perspective?
Yeah, this is a lot of change for someone who's had no change their whole life.
translation.es: Sí. Son muchos cambios. Ella nunca ha cambiado nada en su vida.

translation.en: Yeah.
That can't be easy.
Here you go, Mac, have a great day. All right.
translation.es: Aquí tienes, Mac. Que tengas un lindo día.

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
Hi.
-Don't say it. -Say what?
That you might have been right about moving the register.
translation.es: Tenías razón sobre la caja registradora.

translation.en: Oh. No, I didn't say a word.
Yeah, well, you didn't have to. I can see it all over your face.
translation.es: No es necesario. Se te nota en la cara.

translation.en: I can't help it if you're a highly perceptive woman.
translation.es: No puedo hacer nada. Eres muy intuitiva.

translation.en: I got you something.
-That's for me? -Yeah, you said we needed it.
translation.es: - ¿Es para mí? - Dijiste que lo querías.

translation.en: -What? -It's the prize for the raffle.
It's a jellybean jar, Bean.
Yeah, great, I see that.
Okay. You like it?
-It's perfect. -Okay.
Listen, I think this display case is gonna fit perfectly.
translation.es: Escucha, creo que esta vitrina quedará perfecta.

translation.en: I just have to put it together.
Jelly beans!
That's funny!
Oh, yeah, real funny.
Oh, dear.
I better go help him before he ruins the whole shop.
translation.es: Lo ayudaré antes que destruya toda la tienda.

translation.en: Take it easy on him. He means well.
-Fiddlesticks. -Is everything okay?
Oh, yeah, it's fine.
You know, I didn't realize you and my brother kept in touch all these years.
translation.es: Escucha, no sabía que tú y mi hermano habían seguido en contacto.

translation.en: He never mentioned anything.
I thought about it through the years, but we connected on our high-school class's social media page.
translation.es: Nos pusimos en contacto a través de la red social de la escuela.

translation.en: Oh. I'm surprised you left an exciting city like New York.
translation.es: Me sorprende que hayas dejado una ciudad como Nueva York.

translation.en: Well, I had my reasons, you know.
Don't know if you remember this, but my dad was in the Air Force.

translation.en: Right, I did know that.
Because of his job, we had to move all the time.
translation.es: Nos mudábamos mucho por su trabajo.

translation.en: I… just kind of got used to that.
I've never lived anywhere longer than two years, you know?
translation.es: Nunca viví más de dos años en un mismo lugar.

translation.en: So I guess it was time for me to make a change.
translation.es: Era el momento para un cambio.

translation.en: That must be hard on your friendships or relationships.

translation.en: Yeah, I guess so.
But, you know, I get restless, just get that restless feeling.

translation.en: I wanna move, you know?
No, I actually don't know.
translation.es: No. En realidad, no lo entiendo.

translation.en: I'm not a big fan of change.
translation.es: No me gustan mucho los cambios.

translation.en: I've lived in the same house in the same town and had the same job…
translation.es: He vivido en la misma casa y me he dedicado al mismo trabajo…

translation.en: well, apart from baby-sitting… my whole life.
translation.es: Sin contar ser niñera. Toda la vida.

Well, the university's regional campus was 30 miles away so I lived at home.
translation.es: La universidad quedaba a 50 kilómetros. Seguí viviendo en mi casa.

translation.en: Unlike my daughter, who went as far away as possible.
translation.es: Mi hija, por el contrario, se fue lo más lejos posible.

translation.en: -You must have missed her, I'm sure. -Very much.
But she is following her dreams, and I'm really proud of her.
translation.es: Pero está cumpliendo sus sueños. Estoy muy orgullosa de ella.

translation.en: That's amazing.
Yeah.
She tells me about her adventures.
But I like it here in Bedford.
translation.es: Pero a mí me gusta Bedford.

translation.en: I'm content.
You're content or you're happy?
Well, aren't they the same thing?
Well, no, not really.
Isn't there anything you've wanted to do that's not in this little town?
translation.es: ¿Hay algo que quisieras hacer que no esté aquí en Bedford?

My great grandparents, they're from a small village in Belgium.
translation.es: Mis bisabuelos eran de un pueblito de Bélgica.

translation.en: It's actually where they learned their candy-making secrets.
translation.es: Allí aprendieron los secretos de elaborar dulces.

translation.en: You should go.
Just book a ticket, make a reservation, and go.
translation.es: Compra el boleto, haz una reservación y ve.

translation.en: You make it sound so easy.
I mean, between school and taking care of my parents
translation.es: Entre la universidad, cuidar de mis padres

translation.en: and raising Megan and then taking over at the shop,
translation.es: criar a Megan y trabajar en la tienda,

translation.en: there just was never enough time.
But I'm sure I'll get there one day.
