translation.en: I hope you do.
I guess I better get back to the kitchen.
[Alexandra] Yes, I'm her aunt.
Does she have a temperature?
No? Okay, good. I'm on my way.
Is everything okay?
That was the school nurse. Paige isn't well. I have to take her home.
translation.es: Era la enfermera de la escuela. Paige no se siente bien.

translation.en: -Take your time, I hope she feels better. -Thanks.
translation.es: - Ve. Espero que se mejore. - Gracias.

translation.en: Oh, hi.
Bye.
-Where's the fire? -She had to get her niece.
translation.es: - ¿Hay una emergencia? - Debe ir por su sobrina.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Um…
Listen, can we meet for lunch? My treat?
I would love that, but with Winterfest five days away, I am so busy.
translation.es: Me encantaría, pero el festival es dentro de cinco días.

translation.en: That's exactly what we need to discuss.
But if you're busy, I'll go get sandwiches and we can eat here.
translation.es: Pero, si estás ocupada, traeré algo y comeremos aquí.

translation.en: Yeah…
That's okay, I could probably use some fresh air.
translation.es: Bueno, me haría bien un poco de aire fresco.

translation.en: -Just give me 20 minutes to finish this. -Great.
-I'll meet you in the square? -Yes.
Great.
May I have one?
Are you gonna personally cover the cost for that?
You know I'm good for it.
Wow!
That's amazing.
That's even better than I remembered it.
translation.es: Es mejor de lo que recordaba.

translation.en: I've had gourmet chocolate that doesn't compare to that.
translation.es: He probado chocolate gourmet y no se compara.

translation.en: That means a lot. Thank you.
-Our price point is way too low. -Oh, here we go.
translation.es: - Nuestros precios son muy bajos. - Ya empezamos.

translation.en: No, you're way undervaluing the product.
I really appreciate the compliment,
but there are a lot of hardworking people in this town
translation.es: En esta ciudad, hay mucha gente trabajadora,

translation.en: trying to make ends meet
and they shouldn't have to budget to treat themselves to some candy.
translation.es: y no deberían gastar un dineral para comprar dulces.

translation.en: Okay, point taken.
-I'll see you in the square. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Nos vemos en la plaza. - Sí.

translation.en: So good!
-Brooks! -Hi.
Erin Smythe? We went to high school together.
translation.es: Soy Erin Smythe. Fuimos juntos a la escuela.

translation.en: [Brooks] That's right. Hi, how are you? Nice to see you.
So, what have you been doing? Where are you living now?
Tell me everything.
My parents still have a place here,
and I have a satellite office in Cincinnati.
I am an executive headhunter.
translation.es: Estoy a cargo de incorporar personal ejecutivo.

translation.en: -That's impressive. -What's impressive is your career.
translation.es: - Suena increíble. - Tu carrera es increíble.

translation.en: -I've been watching it over the years. -I've been very fortunate.
translation.es: - He escuchado sobre ti estos años. - Soy un afortunado.

translation.en: What surprised me was the candy shop. That's such a huge departure from your usual ventures.
translation.es: Me sorprendió lo de la tienda de dulces. No es un negocio típico de ti.

translation.en: It is, but it's nice to be back here in Bedford.
translation.es: Sí. Me alegra volver a Belford.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hey.
I don't mean to interrupt. We can talk later.
No, Kerrie, you remember Erin Smythe? Still the last name you go by?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas a Erin Smythe? ¿Aún te apellidas así?

translation.en: Yes, I never married.
Oh, yeah, I sure do.
-Erin, how are you? -Good, thanks for asking.
This is Kerrie, Jake's little sister, my new business partner.
translation.es: Ella es Kerrie, la hermana de Jake y mi nueva socia.

translation.en: Oh, Jake, I adored him. He was the best.
translation.es: Jake, lo adoro. Era el mejor.

translation.en: He still is. I'll tell him you said hello.
translation.es: Todavía lo es. Le daré tus saludos.

translation.en: -Please do. -You gotta come by the shop sometime.
translation.es: - Sí, por favor. - Deberías venir a la tienda.

translation.en: She makes the most unbelievable chocolate and candies…
translation.es: Ella hace dulces y chocolates increíbles.

translation.en: Sounds delicious, but I don't eat sugar.
translation.es: Suena delicioso, pero no consumo azúcar.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't want to keep you two from your business, so…
translation.es: No quiero molestarlos si están trabajando.

translation.en: -We should catch up more later. -I'd love that. Okay, great.
Uh… Italian or turkey?
Ooh! Italian.
-Hey. -Oh, thank you.
I have been going through the financials for the past five years.
translation.es: He leído los libros contables de los últimos cinco años.

translation.en: I think, with a few changes…
we can double last year's numbers.
This is the amount of free product that was given away last year.
translation.es: Esta es la cantidad de productos que se han regalado el año pasado.

translation.en: I thought that was a charitable tax write-off.
Charity is a wonderful thing.
But I think that number's way too high.
translation.es: Pero creo que ese número es muy alto.

translation.en: There are a lot of deserving people, Brooks.
There's first responders, teachers,
the elderly at the Senior Village.
You are a bleeding heart, Kerrie Murphy.
Yes. It bleeds candy.
Not everything is about the bottom line.
translation.es: No todo es sobre el dinero.

translation.en: When you're running a business and trying to be in the black, it is.
translation.es: Lo es si tienes un negocio y quieres obtener ganancias.

translation.en: If that's all you care about, why did you buy into a small, family-owned business?
translation.es: Si eso te importa, ¿por qué comprar un negocio familiar pequeño?

translation.en: We are a far cry from a Fortune 500 company.
translation.es: Nuestro negocio no genera mayores ganancias.

translation.en: No, I see great potential.
Why did you buy Jake out?
'Cause Willy Wonka's my favorite movie. I always wanted to own a candy factory.
translation.es: Desde que vi Willy Wonka, quise tener mi fábrica de chocolate.

translation.en: I'm sorry we don't have a chocolate river for you to fall in.
translation.es: Lamento que no tengamos un río de chocolate.

translation.en: Or Oompa Loompas.
That would be great, wouldn't it?
That's important, a strong work/life balance.
translation.es: Equilibrar la vida y el trabajo es clave.

translation.en: To the bottom line? Well, if you're exhausted and burnt out, you're of no use to me.
translation.es: - ¿Más importante que el dinero? - Si estás muy cansada, no me sirves.

translation.en: No, but seriously.
You work all the time. You need some downtime.
translation.es: Trabajas mucho. Necesitas un poco de tiempo libre.

translation.en: Why don't you take a vacation? Or a staycation.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te tomas unos días libres?

translation.en: It has been a while since I've had any time off.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no tengo vacaciones.

translation.en: I didn't even take a honeymoon.
Free time, I don't know what I'd do with myself.
translation.es: Tiempo libre. No sé qué haría.

translation.en: Take a trip to Europe?
Alone? No.
How long's it been since you were divorced?
I mean… Sorry, that's a personal question.
That's okay.
I got married relatively young.
Marriage lasted about four years.
I naively thought that love could conquer all our differences.
translation.es: Era ingenua. Creía que el amor superaría nuestras diferencias.

translation.en: But he's a good dad to Megan, and that's all that matters.
translation.es: Pero es un buen padre. Es lo único que importa.

translation.en: What about you?
Oh, never married, no kids.
translation.es: Nunca me casé. No tuve hijos.

translation.en: But I am known to my friends' children as "Fun Uncle Brooks."
translation.es: Pero para los hijos de mis amigos soy "el divertido tío Brooks".

translation.en: I was voted "Life of the Party" in high school, remember that?
translation.es: Fui elegido "El alma de la fiesta" en la escuela.

translation.en: Oh, right!
So that's the real reason you wanted to buy into the candy store.
translation.es: Por eso compraste la tienda de dulces.

translation.en: You wanted to keep your title.
Of course. You're seeing through me now.
[Kerrie] How is Paige feeling?
It was just a tummy ache. She's back to a hundred percent.
translation.es: Solo era dolor de estómago. Ya se recuperó.

translation.en: Oh, good. I'm glad.
Have you heard from Megan? How's she doing?
Oh, she is having the time of her life,
visiting a different country every weekend.
translation.es: Visita un país diferente cada semana.

translation.en: You want some more hot cocoa?
Oh, I'm good, thanks.
Oh! I found this this morning.
I have been dying to show you. Wait.
-Look, look, look. -Oh, looks like a yearbook!
-Let's see! -Yes, it is. Look.
This is me.
Right here. My sophomore year.
You are adorable.
Goodness, where does the time go?
translation.es: Dios mío, cómo pasa el tiempo.

translation.en: Let me see if I can find my brother.
-Ooh! There he is. -[Alexandra] Oh, look at Jake!
What was his senior quote?
Oh, "Life is like a box of candies.
translation.es: "La vida es una caja de dulces.

translation.en: You get what you get and you don't get upset."
That is fitting.
Oh, and here's Brooks.
Mm! He was handsome.
And looks super confident even back then.
translation.es: Parece muy seguro, aun siendo tan joven.

translation.en: Confident, arrogant, whatever you want to call it.
"Life belongs to the living,
and he who lives must be prepared for changes."
translation.es: y debemos estar preparados para cambiar".

translation.en: [Alexandra] That's a pretty deep quote for a teenager.
translation.es: Qué frase más profunda para un adolescente.

translation.en: And the polar opposite to your outlook on change.
translation.es: Y es lo opuesto a lo que tú piensas sobre los cambios.

translation.en: Yeah. I guess that's true.
-Thank you. -Here's an order form.
Order form for you?
Order form for you and ord--
Adam! Order form?
Thanks.
-Do you have a pen? -Oh, yep. Ah!
What do you recommend?
Oh, I mean, everything here is delicious.
That's the problem.
Here's a better question: what's your favorite?
Oh, um… peppermint bark.
Peppermint bark it is.
You guys are busier than ever.
We are. It's gonna be crazy until after Winterfest.
translation.es: Sí. Será una locura hasta después del festival.

translation.en: I actually wanted to ask if I could… I guess I'll catch you later.
translation.es: Bueno, yo quería preguntarte… Olvídalo. Te lo diré luego.

translation.en: Yes, please.
I'll be back with more forms.
Bye.
[Brooks] Thank you.
Hi. I'll have three mint meltaways,
translation.es: Hola. Quiero tres bombones de menta

translation.en: three of your new salted coconut caramel buttercreams, please.
translation.es: y tres dulces de crema de coco y caramelo con sal, por favor.

translation.en: Three…
Here you go.
Okay.
[whispering] Kerrie always gives me a sample.
translation.es: Kerrie siempre me da algo para probar.

translation.en: -Don't tell anyone. -It'll be our little secret.
translation.es: - No le cuentes a nadie. - Será nuestro secreto.

translation.en: You need someone sweet in your life.
translation.es: Necesitas a alguien dulce en tu vida.

translation.en: No, I have my dad.
Though I wouldn't call him sweet, the word I'd use is "cantankerous."
translation.es: Aunque no diría que es dulce. Más bien, gruñón.

translation.en: Well, keep your eye open. You never know.
Thank you.
You weren't kidding. It's the busiest time of year.
translation.es: En verdad son días de mucho trabajo.

translation.en: It's a madhouse up there. We're out of vanilla buttercreams.
translation.es: Es una locura. Se acabaron los de vainilla.

translation.en: -No, I made a batch earlier this morning. -I'll go get them.
translation.es: - No. Hice más esta mañana. - Ya los busco.

translation.en: -You are unbelievable. -You're just figuring that out?
translation.es: - Eres increíble. - ¿No lo habías notado antes?

translation.en: Well, teenage boys are not known for their wisdom.
translation.es: Los adolescentes no suelen ser sabios.

translation.en: -Yeah? What's your excuse now? -It's unbelievable how good these are.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es tu excusa ahora? - Estos son deliciosos.

translation.en: Someday you'll have to teach me your magical candy-making secrets.
translation.es: Algún día me tienes que enseñar tus mejores secretos.

translation.en: I'm making chocolate snowflakes tonight.
You're welcome to stick around and help if you want.
-Really? -Sure.
-I wouldn't be in the way? -If you are, I'll kick you out.
translation.es: - ¿No te molestaré? - Si lo haces, te echaré.

translation.en: I believe you would. [laughs]
-I'd love that, I'll bring coffee. -A hot cider, and you're on.
translation.es: - Traeré café. - Mejor trae sidra caliente.

translation.en: Aye-aye, Bean.
Thank you.
Don't give me that look.
Hi, Erin, how are you?
[Erin] You will never guess who I just got off the phone with.
A global top ten company.
translation.es: Una de las mejores empresas del mundo.

translation.en: And they are looking for a new COO.
I immediately thought of you.
Global top ten?! That's incredible.
These positions rarely open up.
They are highly coveted and very prestigious.
Not to mention the bonuses and benefits.
Now, their main office is in California,
translation.es: La oficina principal está en California.

translation.en: but they would be open to you working from the Cincinnati office.
translation.es: Pero aceptarían que trabajes desde Cincinnati.

translation.en: I told them all about you, they're very impressed.
Wow! Wow!
They want to meet you.
Listen, I know this is a once-in-a-lifetime offer,
translation.es: Escucha, sé que es una oferta única.

translation.en: and I'm very flattered, but--
You don't need to decide this minute.
Take some time. All right?
All right.
Listen, I've got another call.
I will fill you in on the rest of the details later.
-How does over a late dinner sound? -Sure, but--
translation.es: - ¿Qué te parece si cenamos? - Claro, pero…

translation.en: Great, can't wait.
Okay. Ready for my first lesson.
translation.es: Bueno. Estoy listo para mi primera clase.

translation.en: All right.
This is a cacao bean from South America.
translation.es: Estos son granos de cacao traídos de Sudamérica.

translation.en: Our family has done business with the same cocoa farm for generations.
translation.es: Siempre hemos trabajado con los mismos productores de cacao.

translation.en: It's not like a coffee bean,
translation.es: No es un grano de café,

translation.en: but with a little alchemy, it'll turn into…
Liquid gold.
Yes.
There's a reason they say chocolate is the food of the gods.
translation.es: Dicen que el chocolate es la comida de los dioses.

translation.en: Um, pick a mold.
Okay, any mold?
Any mold.
Oh. I'll do that. Winter tulips.
Oh! You're a romantic. Who knew?
I think people are beginning to suspect.
Okay, this is your chocolate. It's the right temperature.
translation.es: Aquí está el chocolate. Tiene la temperatura ideal.

translation.en: It's pretty simple, you're gonna pour it into this mold.
translation.es: Es muy sencillo. Vierte el chocolate en el molde.

translation.en: You're an artist and chocolate is your medium.
translation.es: Eres una artista. Te expresas con el chocolate.

translation.en: [Kerrie] I think it is a good combination of art and science.
translation.es: Es una buena combinación de arte y ciencia.

translation.en: I never get to do anything creative in my line of work.
translation.es: Nunca hago nada creativo en mi trabajo.

translation.en: It's all spreadsheets and numbers.
This is fun.
If you think this is fun, wait till we make butterscotch candy pillows.
translation.es: Entonces, te gustará más hacer dulces de azúcar y mantequilla.

translation.en: Have you ever thought about teaching a class?
Actually, I would like to teach a class.
In fact, Jake and I talked about that and then we never organized anything.
translation.es: Jake y yo lo hemos hablado, pero nunca lo pusimos en marcha.

translation.en: Really? I'll be happy to set that up for you if you want.
translation.es: ¿En serio? Me encantaría ayudarte con eso.

translation.en: -Really? -No problem.
Thanks.
That's okay. That's okay.
We're just gonna do this.
All you have to do is tip that, then we'll fill all the molds.
translation.es: Debes inclinarlo y llenar todos los espacios.

translation.en: Hello.
-Oh, Erin. Hi, how are you? -Hi.
-Come in. -Thanks.
You didn't text me back about what time you wanted to have that late dinner.
translation.es: No me dijiste a qué hora cenaríamos.

translation.en: Oh, uh… Sorry, my phone was off and we were in the middle of--
translation.es: Perdona. Mi teléfono estaba apagado. Estamos haciendo…

translation.en: Kerrie is teaching me how to make and pour chocolate molds.
translation.es: Kerrie me está enseñando a usar los moldes para el chocolate.

translation.en: I find that's a useful skill for a candy shop owner.
translation.es: El dueño de una tienda de dulces debe saber usarlos.

translation.en: Of course. [laughs]
Oh! Who knew you, of all people, would have turned out to be Willy Wonka?
translation.es: ¿Quién hubiera dicho que te convertirías en Willy Wonka?

translation.en: [laughs] That's actually just what we were saying.
Well, you should get going.
No, but the lesson.
No, it's fine. We can do it another time.
Go, have fun.
Come on, she doesn't mind.
translation.es: Vamos. A ella no le molesta.

translation.en: All right, let me go get my coat.
translation.es: Está bien. Iré por mi abrigo.

translation.en: [sighs] Do you want some candy?
-No, you don't eat sugar. -Right.
What was I thinking? I practically kicked him out the door.
translation.es: ¿En qué estaba pensando? Fue como si lo hubiera echado.

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds like someone is catching feelings.
translation.es: Parece que alguien se está involucrando.

translation.en: What is that, like catching a cold?
Girl, it means you like him.
[laughing] No. No, no, no.
I admit, the business partnership is working out better than I expected,
translation.es: Debo admitir que la sociedad está funcionando bien,

translation.en: but I do not need any romantic entanglements to complicate my life.
translation.es: pero no necesito un enredo amoroso que complique mi vida.

translation.en: I like my life the way it is.
translation.es: Quiero mi vida tal cual es.

translation.en: Change isn't always a bad thing.
translation.es: Los cambios no siempre son mala idea.

translation.en: Like you said, the new partnership is working out.
Maybe a new relationship will too?
Even if…
No.
Anyway, he's dating Erin.
translation.es: No importa. Está saliendo con Erin.

translation.en: That's the cheerleader he took to the dance over me.
translation.es: Es la porrista con quien fue al baile.

translation.en: You're kidding?
But it's okay, if he's happy, I'm happy for him.
translation.es: Si él está feliz, me alegro por él.

translation.en: I see the way you two look at each other, I wouldn't write him off just yet.
translation.es: Vi cómo se miraban. Yo lo intentaría.

translation.en: Alexandra! You forgot your scarf.
I wouldn't want your neck to get cold.
That was thoughtful of you. Thank you.
Any time.
Looks like someone else is catching feelings.
translation.es: Parece que alguien se está involucrando.

translation.en: He's just being friendly.
He's a very conscientious restaurateur.
translation.es: Es muy atento en su trabajo.

translation.en: I don't know about that.
If I left my scarf, I'm pretty sure it would end up in the lost-and-found bin.
translation.es: Si olvidara algo, seguro iría a la caja de objetos perdidos.

translation.en: Oh, come on, Winterfest is just two days away.
translation.es: Vámonos. Faltan dos días para el festival.

translation.en: We got a lot to do.
Morning.
Morning.
I'm going to finish the last batch of peanut brittle.
translation.es: Terminaré con los crocantes de maní.

translation.en: How was your date?
I wouldn't call it a date.
Just a couple of friends having pizza and catching up.
translation.es: Solo nos pusimos al día, como amigos.

translation.en: Erin's an executive headhunter,
but I like to think that I've left that world behind.
translation.es: pero, por suerte, yo ya dejé ese mundo.

translation.en: Oh, well, good for her.
And good for you.
Yeah.
She's a good person and a good friend, but not what I'm looking for.
translation.es: Es una buena persona y amiga, pero no es lo que estoy buscando.

translation.en: What are you looking for?
It's funny, I was thinking about this the other day.
translation.es: Estuve pensando en esto hace unos días.

translation.en: I think…
I think I'd like a best friend.
translation.es: Creo que quiero una mejor amiga.

translation.en: Someone who challenges me, but also who has my back.
translation.es: Alguien que me ayude a superarme y que también pueda contenerme.

translation.en: Who's genuine but genuinely cares about me, you know?
translation.es: Alguien que en verdad se preocupe por mí, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: I agree.
That is the least of what you deserve.
Okay. [chuckles]
What, uh…
What do you mean?
I'm just saying, um, that…
that you deserve someone who sees that,
translation.es: mereces a alguien que pueda ver

translation.en: underneath that often bossy, take charge, sometimes socially tone-deaf successful suit exterior…
translation.es: que, más allá de ser mandón y controlador, y tener poca sensibilidad social,

translation.en: is a really decent guy.
Thank you.
That's nice, thank you.
You're welcome.
-[door opens] -Oh, hi, welcome to Murphy's.
-[woman] Hi. -What can I get for you?
[sighs] I'm off to the Senior Pavilion.
Need any help?
Oh, no, I shouldn't be that long. Um…
Also, Brooks will be by after lunch.
Sounds good. I've got everything covered.
-I can see that, that is amazing. -Thanks.
-You're so talented. -See you later.
translation.es: - Eres muy talentosa. - Nos vemos luego.

translation.en: This will look nice on your door, until next spring at least.
translation.es: Esto quedará bien en tu puerta, al menos hasta la primavera.

translation.en: This is for my new friend, Eileen.
translation.es: Es para mi nueva amiga Eileen.

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.
-Isn't tomorrow the big Winterfest? -Yeah. Yeah, it is.
translation.es: - ¿Mañana es el Festival de Invierno? - Sí, así es.

translation.en: Oh, that reminds me. I brought you your favorite candy.
translation.es: Por cierto, traje tus dulces favoritos.

translation.en: Rocky road fudge?
What? Since when is that your favorite?
I got you toffee.
Well… I'm just testing.
Toffee is my favorite, come on!
Yeah!
How is that all coming along with your new business partner?
translation.es: ¿Cómo van las cosas con tu nueva socia?

translation.en: Great. She's feisty.
She's a mama bear with a cub when it comes to her shop.
translation.es: Se preocupa mucho por la tienda.

translation.en: She really speaks her mind.
But she's also passionate about her craft.
translation.es: Y le apasiona lo que hace.

translation.en: But then when she lets her guard down, she's sweet.
translation.es: Cuando tiene la guardia baja, es muy dulce.

translation.en: Pardon the pun. [chuckles]
But she's fun, she's funny.
Sounds like a perfect match for you.
No, not like that, Dad.
Just because you've been burned once doesn't mean you give up altogether.
translation.es: Que hayas fallado una vez no significa que debas rendirte.

translation.en: Dad, we're business partners, that's it.
translation.es: Papá, somos socios. Es solo eso.

translation.en: Look, it seems to me, son, that if you share the same values
translation.es: Mira, hijo. Si tienen los mismos valores

translation.en: and goals and outlooks,
and you know how to compromise,
translation.es: y saben llegar a un acuerdo,

translation.en: you've got most of the ingredients to have a successful relationship.
translation.es: tienen todo lo necesario para que la relación funcione.

translation.en: I had a big offer,
the kind you don't refuse, come across my desk.
translation.es: una de esas imposibles de rechazar.

translation.en: -And? -Well, I'm thinking it over.
I told them I needed some time.
Although I'd be lying if I said I wasn't tempted.
But also, I don't really miss that shark- and piranha-filled world.
translation.es: Pero no extraño ese mundo lleno de tiburones y pirañas.

translation.en: And I made a commitment to Jake and Kerrie, so…
translation.es: Les di mi palabra a Jake y a Kerrie.

translation.en: The important question is, are you happy here?
translation.es: Lo más importante es: ¿eres feliz aquí?

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
That's all that matters.
Brooks?
Kerrie! Hi. What are you doing here?
What are you doing here?
This is my dad, Joel.
Everybody calls me Papa Joel.
It is very nice to meet you, Papa Joel.
I see where Brooks gets his sparkling eyes.
And his sweet tooth. [chuckles]
translation.es: Y mi amor por los dulces.

translation.en: It's nicer meeting you. I've heard a lot about you.
translation.es: Me alegra conocerte. He escuchado mucho de ti.

translation.en: Oh, no. If you heard it from him, it's probably not true.
translation.es: Si él le habló de mí, son todas mentiras.

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, I like her.
He doesn't say that about many people.
translation.es: No dice eso de muchas personas.

translation.en: Well, I'm honored.
Uh, what are you doing here, making deliveries for Winterfest?
translation.es: ¿Qué haces aquí? ¿Traes algo para el festival?

translation.en: You know, you would probably consider this
a bimonthly, tax deductible charitable donation,
translation.es: una donación bimestral deducible de impuestos,

translation.en: but I like to call it, "never showing up empty-handed when you're visiting friends."
translation.es: pero yo le llamo "Nunca debes ir con las manos vacías a visitar amigos".

translation.en: Martha! That is a beautiful wreath.
I have your favorite candy. You're gonna love this.
translation.es: Traje tus dulces favoritos. Te encantarán.

translation.en: Well…
Oh! Making these winter wreaths just wears me out.
I'm gonna take a nap.
Oh, yeah, Dad, it's real strenuous.
And, uh, I think
that you should just go over there
and help that pretty business partner of yours.
translation.es: y ayudar a tu bonita socia.

translation.en: -That's real subtle, Dad. -I'll see you later.
translation.es: - Qué discreto eres. - Nos vemos luego.

translation.en: All right, enjoy, you guys.
-Hi. -Hi.
You need any help?
Sure. Would you mind giving this to Jack? He's over there.
translation.es: Claro. ¿Podrías darle esto a Jack? Está allí.

translation.en: He has allergies so I make these special for him.
translation.es: Es alérgico. Preparé estos solo para él.

translation.en: What?
Nothing. You just…
you continue to surprise me.
Well, I could say the same about you.
Thank you for helping me.
Oh, and for not lecturing me about all the product I'm giving away.
translation.es: Y por no darme un sermón sobre regalar productos.

translation.en: I would never do that.
Look how happy you're making everybody.
translation.es: Mira lo feliz que haces a todos.

translation.en: Okay, who are you and what have you done with my business partner?
translation.es: ¿Quién eres y qué has hecho con mi socio?

translation.en: That's true.
I have spent my whole life being obsessed with the bottom line,
translation.es: He pasado toda mi vida obsesionado con las cuentas,

translation.en: but I think now I'm realizing that, I don't know…
translation.es: pero ahora creo que… No lo sé.

translation.en: there's more to life.
Well, I suppose without a profit,
there wouldn't be any product to give away, so…
So you're saying that we make a good team? Yeah?
translation.es: ¿Estás diciendo que somos un buen equipo?

translation.en: Hey, when you're done with this, there's something I want to show you.
translation.es: Escucha, quiero mostrarte algo cuando estés libre.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Okay?
I found this place when I was out with my dad.
translation.es: Lo encontré caminando con mi papá.

translation.en: Oh, it's really nice.
How come your dad lives here and not with you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tu papá vive aquí y no contigo?

translation.en: Or is that too personal?
No, not at all.
He says he doesn't like my cooking.
[laughs] He's just very independent.
And he also has a very active social life.
translation.es: Tiene una vida social muy activa.

translation.en: I think it comes from years of living on a military base surrounded by people.
translation.es: Ha vivido en una base militar con muchas otras personas.

translation.en: Oh, that makes sense.
I bet Papa Joel is popular with the ladies too.
translation.es: Papá Joel debe ser muy popular entre las mujeres.

translation.en: He has friends, but he says that my mom was the love of his life,
translation.es: Tiene amigas, pero dice que mi madre fue el amor de su vida.

translation.en: his soulmate, and the only one that's truly in his heart.
translation.es: Su alma gemela, a quien en verdad amó.

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -Yeah.
I've always wanted to have that kind of devotion to someone, but…
translation.es: Siempre quise sentir eso por alguien, pero…

translation.en: But you never live in one place long enough?
translation.es: ¿Nunca te quedas mucho tiempo en un mismo lugar?

translation.en: Okay. I accept that.
But I've answered all your questions. Come here.
translation.es: He contestado tus preguntas. Ven aquí.

translation.en: I've got some… [clears throat]
Why did you shun me so much in high school?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me ignorabas tanto en el secundario?

translation.en: I didn't shun you.
Okay.
This is gonna sound really childish now, but…
translation.es: Esto va a sonar muy infantil,

translation.en: you picked on me all the time.
translation.es: pero me molestabas todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Relentlessly.
Well, yeah, of course.
You were my best friend's very cute, off-limits little sister.
translation.es: Eras la hermosa y prohibida hermana de mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: Of course I picked on you. That was my job.
translation.es: Era obvio que te iba a molestar. Era mi rol.

translation.en: You were also very arrogant!
Okay.
Yeah.
I accept that.
I was the new kid in a new school every other year
translation.es: Siempre era el chico nuevo de la escuela.

translation.en: since I was five years old, so I learned to go in strong.
translation.es: Me cambiaban muy seguido, así que aprendí a pisar fuerte.

translation.en: Otherwise, I'd be eaten alive.
Kids are vicious. Especially in high school.
translation.es: Los jóvenes pueden ser muy agresivos.

translation.en: So it was a façade, was it?
Yeah, more than you know.
Listen, I want to apologize.
I didn't mean to pick on you. I never meant that meanly.
translation.es: No quería molestarte. No hubo mala intención.

translation.en: I'm very sorry.
And I wanna ask you if there's anything else that I did during that time,
translation.es: Quiero saber si te hice daño en algún otro momento.

translation.en: because I would like to apologize for that too.
Fine.
When I was a sophomore and you were a senior…
translation.es: Yo iba al penúltimo año y tú, al último.

translation.en: I was under the impression that you invited me
to be your date to the Winter Snowball Dance.
translation.es: ser tu cita en el Baile de Invierno.

translation.en: I bought a dress, I did my hair and make-up, and…
translation.es: Compré un vestido. Me arreglé el pelo, me maquillé.

translation.en: I waited all night and you never showed up.
translation.es: Esperé toda la noche y nunca llegaste.

translation.en: I nev-- I'm so sorry, Kerrie, I never knew that I gave you that impression.
translation.es: Nunca… Lo siento mucho, Kerrie. Nunca te pedí eso.

translation.en: -If I had known, I never would have-- -I know.
translation.es: - Si hubiera sabido, no habría… - Lo sé.

translation.en: -I'm sorry, Bean. -Oh, that's another thing.
I detested that nickname.
Because of you, in high school, I was called
translation.es: Por tu culpa, tuve tantos apodos

translation.en: every variation a person could think of.
Uh, Stinky Bean, Bossy Bean, Jelly Bean.
The list went on and on.
Sorry.
Listen, I would like you to consider forgiving me,
and I would like to ask you if this could be a fresh start for us.
translation.es: y pedirte que comencemos de nuevo.

translation.en: What do you say?
Okay.
Fresh start.
You never did tell me why you moved back.
translation.es: No has mencionado por qué volviste.

translation.en: Here? Oh, I just… Yeah, I had fond memories of Bedford.
translation.es: ¿Aquí? Solo… Sí… Bedford me trae lindos recuerdos.

translation.en: I wanted to get out of the city, and Jake called at the right time, so…
translation.es: Quería irme de la ciudad. Jake llamó en el momento justo.

translation.en: And, uh, also…
What?
It's nothing.
That's okay.
We should get going. Lots to do before the big day tomorrow.
Okay. All right, let's get to it.
Okay.
-A fresh start. -Yes. Fresh start.
translation.es: - Un nuevo comienzo. - Un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: I remember when you and Jake planned the senior prank
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando hicieron la broma de los graduados.

translation.en: and you bubble-wrapped the hallways.
translation.es: Y el papel burbuja en los pasillos.

translation.en: [chuckles] I plead the fifth.
Although I will say, whoever thought of that… absolute genius.
translation.es: Pero quien pensó en eso es un verdadero genio.

translation.en: It was funny.
I also remember a sweet sophomore gifting the entire graduating senior class
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando una hermosa niña del penúltimo año nos regaló

translation.en: their own personalized box of candy.
Yes, you almost didn't get one. My parents made me include you.
translation.es: No quería dártela. Mis padres me obligaron.

translation.en: It's kind of embarrassing. I've never had a…
I don't know how a cocoa bomb works.
translation.es: No sé servir las bombas de chocolate.

translation.en: Oh, well, I'll show you.
You take this, you put it right in there.
And then you add some hot milk.
Watch this.
See, that explodes, and there are all the marshmallows.
translation.es: La bomba explota y ahí están los malvaviscos.

translation.en: Oh, that's cool!
-Try it. -Oh. Thank you.
That's amazing.
You made all those? That's incredible.
Oh, it's not that hard. I can teach you.
[clears throat] Well, that is the last one.
Think we're all set for tomorrow.
Okay, well, I have some financials to do, so…
translation.es: Bueno, debo encargarme de las cuentas.

translation.en: I'll lock up, you guys can take off.
Okay. Don't work too late.
We have a big day tomorrow.
Yes, ma'am.
I'll go get my coat and my things.
translation.es: Voy por mi abrigo y mis cosas.

translation.en: I haven't seen you smile like this since I don't know when.
translation.es: No recuerdo la última vez que te vi sonreír así.

translation.en: After my divorce, I just focused on raising Megan and running the shop.
translation.es: Después del divorcio, me dediqué a cuidar de Megan y a la tienda.

translation.en: I didn't want another failed relationship.
Maybe you didn't fail. Maybe the marriage failed you.
translation.es: Quizás tú no fallaste y el matrimonio te falló a ti.

translation.en: Maybe.
I'm happy for you.
Everyone deserves a second chance.
Especially when it comes to love.
translation.es: En especial si es por amor.

translation.en: Jake. What time is it there?
And what are you eating?
I was hungry for a midnight snack.
translation.es: Un bocadillo después de la cena.

translation.en: It's almost one a.m. I couldn't sleep.
translation.es: Es casi la una de la mañana.

translation.en: Beans on toast.
Funny with the beans.
So… you all set for Winterfest tomorrow?
Yes. The candy is all made
and Brooks is going to meet me early and help me set up the booth.
translation.es: Brooks vendrá temprano. Me ayudará en nuestro puesto.

translation.en: Yeah, he mentioned that to me when I spoke to him earlier.
translation.es: Sí. Me lo dijo. Hablé con él.

translation.en: You talked to him?
Don't worry, he's going to turn down Erin's business proposal.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Rechazará la propuesta de Erin.

translation.en: Wait, what business proposal?
I thought he told you.
Apparently not.
You care to fill me in?
Jake?
I'm waiting.
-[indistinct chatter] -[upbeat music playing]
Here you go. Happy Winterfest.
I'm feeling a little thirsty. Would you like a hot cider?
-I'd love one. -Okay.
I'll be right back.
-Hey. -Hey.
There you go. What's going on with Kerrie?
What do you mean?
Is she okay?
Oh, she's probably just stressed.
This is the biggest day of the year for the shop.
translation.es: Es el día más importante del año.

translation.en: Right. Where did she go?
To get us a couple of hot ciders.
Oh. Do you want one?
No, thanks. One is plenty for me.
Oh, right, okay.
Two ciders, please.
-Hey. -Hey.
-Busy day, huh? -Oh, yeah, very busy.
You're not upset with me?
No, I just have to get back to the booth. Can we talk later? Great.
translation.es: No. Debo volver al puesto. Hablaremos más tarde.

translation.en: Hey, you.
Oh, hey, Erin. Hi.
I had a fun time the other night.
It was fun, yeah, connecting with old friends.
translation.es: Fue divertido hablar con viejos amigos.

translation.en: Not that you're old. That's not what I meant.
translation.es: No lo digo porque seas vieja.

translation.en: I do. I know what you mean.
Not to sound cliché, but it's true, you know what they say. Old friends are the best.
translation.es: Sabes lo que dicen: "Los viejos amigos son los mejores".

translation.en: Absolutely. Yeah.
So, not to pressure you, but I need to know.
translation.es: No quiero presionarte, pero necesito tu respuesta.

translation.en: There you go.
What's going on with you two?
Nothing. What do you mean?
Yesterday it was all fireworks, today it's like the ice age.
translation.es: Ayer estaban bien, hoy están distantes.

translation.en: Oh, hi, Eileen, how are you? I have your order.
I am fantastic and enjoying this wonderful festival.
translation.es: Estoy fantástica. Disfruto de este hermoso festival.

translation.en: -How are you? -Oh, great.
Winterfest is the best time of year.
translation.es: El Festival de Invierno es el mejor día del año.

translation.en: Are you all right, dear?
Yes. It's just been a tumultuous month, and once again, things aren't certain.
translation.es: Sí. Es solo que ha sido un mes difícil y no se sabe qué va a pasar.

translation.en: [Eileen] Nothing in life ever is.
But I do believe that what's meant to be will always find a way.
translation.es: Pero siempre creo que sucederá lo que está escrito en nuestro destino.

translation.en: The client is really interested in meeting you,
and between you and me, you are a shoo-in for the COO position.
translation.es: Y, entre nosotros, el puesto de director ejecutivo es tuyo.

translation.en: It would be a huge step up in the corporate world.
translation.es: Es una gran oportunidad en el mundo corporativo.

translation.en: But I need to know either way.
I can't tell you how much I appreciate this offer,
translation.es: En verdad agradezco mucho la oferta,

translation.en: but, even though I might regret this in the future,
I'm going to turn down the opportunity.
I'm very committed to this little shop.
translation.es: Estoy muy comprometido con la tienda.

translation.en: I understand.
You know where to find me if you change your mind.
translation.es: Sabes cómo encontrarme si cambias de opinión.

translation.en: Oh. Sorry. A little something in my throat.
translation.es: Disculpa. Tenía algo en la garganta.

translation.en: One second, I have your order.
Megan!
-Surprise! -Oh, my goodness!
You're supposed to be in Europe! What are you doing here?
translation.es: Deberías estar en Europa. ¿Qué haces aquí?

translation.en: [Megan] I got your email and I wanted to surprise you!
-Uncle Jake helped me with the ticket. -That was so nice of him.
translation.es: - El tío Jake me compró el boleto. - Qué amable.

translation.en: -I have to fly back on Monday, but-- -I'm so happy you're here!
translation.es: - Debo regresar el lunes, pero… - ¡Me alegra que estés aquí!

translation.en: Megan, this is Brooks, my business partner.
translation.es: Megan, él es Brooks, mi socio.

translation.en: -Brooks, this is my daughter Megan. -I've heard so much about you.
translation.es: - Brooks. Mi hija, Megan. - Me han hablado de ti.

translation.en: Yeah, same here.
I've missed this.
I haven't been home for Winterfest in years.
translation.es: Hace años que me pierdo el festival.

translation.en: Well, that is the nice thing about traditions.
translation.es: Eso es lo lindo de las tradiciones.

translation.en: You can always come back to them.
But I do worry about you,
especially with Uncle Jake and Ophelia and me so far away.
translation.es: El tío Jake, Ophelia y yo vivimos muy lejos de aquí.

translation.en: I'll be fine, I'll figure it out.
Aren't you always telling me
communication is the most important thing in any relationship?
translation.es: que la comunicación es importante en las relaciones?

translation.en: Well… things are a little more complicated with good old Brooks.
translation.es: Las cosas se han puesto difíciles desde que llegó Brooks.

translation.en: Only if you let it be.
translation.es: Será así si tú lo permites.

translation.en: When did you get so smart?
I get it from my mom. [chuckles]
I see a couple friends I want to say hi to.
translation.es: Veo a unos amigos. Iré a saludar.

translation.en: Oh, okay. And here's our raffle ticket. Let me know if we win anything.
translation.es: Este es nuestro boleto del sorteo. Avísame si ganamos algo.

translation.en: -You got it. -Love you.
[Megan] Love you.
Hi. Hope I didn't interrupt.
No, she just wanted to say hi to some friends.
translation.es: No. Ella fue con unos amigos.

translation.en: Um, I'm told that it's a tradition here at Winterfest
translation.es: Escuché que es tradición que los socios bailen

translation.en: for partners to dance.
Would you dance with me?
If you don't tell me what the problem is, I don't know how to fix it.
translation.es: Si no me dices qué sucede, no podré ayudarte.

translation.en: I just had my whole life turned upside down.
So if you and the pretty headhunter are going to leave me in the lurch,
translation.es: Si tú y tu bella reclutadora se marcharán y me dejarán sola,

translation.en: I'd rather know sooner than later.
I knew it.
No, wait. Let me explain.
You asked why I bought Jake out.
translation.es: Me preguntaste por qué compré la parte de Jake.

translation.en: And I just didn't tell you everything.
translation.es: No te dije toda la verdad.

translation.en: When I was in New York, I was engaged.
And the relationship wasn't perfect, but I was dedicated to it,
translation.es: No era todo perfecto, pero daba lo mejor de mí.

translation.en: until I discovered that the woman that I was with,
translation.es: Hasta que me di cuenta de que mi pareja

translation.en: she wasn't the woman that she said she was at all.
translation.es: no era la mujer que decía ser.

translation.en: It was just…
it was utterly humiliating
to know that the person I trusted most in the world, she…
translation.es: La persona en quien más confiaba

translation.en: she betrayed me, in more ways than one.
And then the fallout, professionally and personally, it just…
translation.es: Eso afectó mi vida profesional y personal.

translation.en: Brooks, I am so sorry. I had no idea.
translation.es: Brooks, lo siento. No lo sabía.

translation.en: So that's why you left New York.
I just started re-evaluating my life, my career choices,
translation.es: Empecé a reflexionar sobre mi vida y mi carrera.

translation.en: just everything.
And I decided that I wanted to make a clean break from that world.
translation.es: Decidí empezar de cero y alejarme de ese mundo.

translation.en: That's right when your brother called me.
translation.es: Y entonces tu hermano me llamó.

translation.en: What about this new business opportunity with Erin?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hay acerca de la propuesta de Erin?

translation.en: I said no. I don't want to go back into that world.
translation.es: La rechacé. No quiero regresar a ese mundo.

translation.en: Are you sure this is what you want?
Yep.
That chapter of my life is closed.
translation.es: Ese capítulo de mi vida está cerrado.

translation.en: It's finished.
And I'm very excited to be writing this new chapter with you, together.
translation.es: Y me alegra mucho escribir un nuevo capítulo contigo, juntos.

translation.en: Thanks.
Oh. Adam, hi!
I didn't see you earlier. Oh, let me find your order.
translation.es: No te vi en el festival. Iré por tu pedido.

translation.en: I finally managed to escape the restaurant.
No. It's for you.
As are these.
They're beautiful.
My favorites, how did you know?
I was hoping we could have dinner this week?
translation.es: Pensaba que podríamos salir a cenar.

translation.en: It'll be nice letting someone else cook for once.
translation.es: Será lindo que alguien más cocine por mí.

translation.en: I'd like that a lot.
Well, I gotta get back to the Eatery.
I'm not complaining about being busy, but… I understand.
translation.es: - No me quejo de tener trabajo, pero… - Comprendo.

translation.en: Thanks again for these.
You're welcome.
Hi. Sorry.
I…
I think we should probably get back to the booth.
translation.es: Creo que debemos regresar a nuestro puesto.

translation.en: Sure.
-How's it going? -Oh, good. Better than ever.
-We thought you could use a break. -Thanks.
Do we have more chocolate peanut butter fudge? We're out.
translation.es: ¿Tenemos más dulces de chocolate con maní?

translation.en: Yes. I made a extra batch this morning. It's at the shop.
translation.es: Hice más esta mañana. Están en la tienda.

translation.en: -I'll get it. I'll be right back. -[Kerrie] Thank you.
You two looked pretty cozy out on the dance floor.
translation.es: Se veían muy cariñosos en la pista de baile.

translation.en: Oh, it's a Winterfest tradition.
Business partners have to dance at least one dance together.
translation.es: Los socios tienen que bailar. Una canción, al menos.

translation.en: Uh-huh.
These are some nice flowers. Where did they come from?
Uh-huh.
David, give these to your grandmother. They are her favorite.
translation.es: David, son para tu abuela. Son sus favoritos.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Kerrie!
-Oh, Tim! -Do you have a minute?
-Sure. -I've been meaning to call.
I did a little digging and the paperwork was signed.
translation.es: Estuve investigando. Los papeles están firmados.

translation.en: It was just filed incorrectly.
So, your loan has been approved.
Congratulations!
Now you can buy out your obnoxious, controlling egoist of a business partner.
translation.es: Puedes comprar la parte de tu socio odioso, controlador y egoísta.

translation.en: You're free.
Congratulations.
I acted impulsively because I was upset about something.
translation.es: Actué de manera impulsiva. Estaba angustiada.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Tim, but I'm not gonna need that loan.
translation.es: Lo lamento, Tim. No necesitaré el préstamo.

translation.en: Things with my new business partner are better than I could have dreamed.
translation.es: Las cosas con mi socio funcionan mejor de lo que esperaba.

translation.en: -Again, I'm sorry for the inconvenience. -No worries.
translation.es: - Disculpa haberte molestado. - No te preocupes.

translation.en: I'm glad to hear it.
Come by the booth for some peanut chocolate butter fudge.
translation.es: Ven al puesto. Tengo dulces de chocolate con maní.

translation.en: On the house.
I'll gladly take you up on that.
Hey, Erin, it's Brooks. Hey, I had a bit of a change of heart.
translation.es: Erin, soy Brooks. Escucha, cambié de opinión.

translation.en: I'm wondering if you could set up that interview for me.
Call me back, let me know. Thank you.
[Megan] Mom! You won!
-What? I never win anything. -Well, you did this time.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? Nunca he ganado nada. - Esta vez, sí.

translation.en: Open it!
Are you kidding?
Seriously?
It's meant to be.
A couple friends are getting together at Izzy's house.
translation.es: Unos amigos irán a la casa de Izzy.

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Go, have a good time.
Okay, thank you.
-Love you. -Love you too.
-See ya, Alexandra. -See ya, honey.
Did Brooks say when he would be coming back?
He didn't. Just said he had some calls to return.
translation.es: No. Dijo que haría unas llamadas.

translation.en: -Hi. Here's your coffee. -Oh, thanks.
Have you seen Brooks?
I looked for him after Winterfest last night
translation.es: Lo busqué cuando terminó el festival.

translation.en: and he hasn't returned my messages.
It's not like him.
I haven't seen him since he dropped off the fudge at the booth.
translation.es: Lo vi por última vez anoche, en el puesto.

translation.en: You know what… I'm starting to worry.
Maybe he just lost his phone.
Yeah. Well, whatever. I hope he's okay.
translation.es: Sí. Lo que sea. Espero que esté bien.

translation.en: Still no response.
What's so urgent that you had to interrupt bingo?
translation.es: ¿Es tan urgente? Debí interrumpir el bingo.

translation.en: I was winning.
Do you remember that big offer I told you about?
-The one you can't turn down? -Yeah, that's the one.
And the main campus is in California, so get your surfboard ready.
translation.es: La oficina principal está en California. Prepara tu tabla de surf.

translation.en: Well.
I thought things were going pretty well?
translation.es: Pensé que las cosas iban bien entre tú y Kerrie.

translation.en: You and Kerrie seemed to be hitting it off.
Am I wrong?
No. No, I was.
I thought you wanted to move to the Golden State?
I kinda like living in the Buckeye State.
translation.es: Empieza a gustarme vivir en Ohio.

translation.en: What happened?
I don't know, Dad.
Just wrong about a woman again.
Anyway, listen, if you want to stay here,
there's offices in Cincinnati that I can work out of.
translation.es: trabajaré desde la oficina de Cincinnati.

translation.en: I'll make sure everything's taken care of.
translation.es: Me ocuparé de que no te falte nada.

translation.en: No, I go where you go.
I've had a great life.
Your happiness is what matters to me.
translation.es: Lo único que me importa es que seas feliz.

translation.en: Thanks. I love you, Dad.
You don't look very happy.
As a matter of fact, you look downright miserable.
translation.es: En verdad, te ves muy mal.

translation.en: You wanna talk about it?
No, not really. No.
You've got to remember that Kerrie isn't Sierra.
translation.es: Recuerda que Kerrie no es como Sierra.

translation.en: I gotta go to Cincinnati, sign these papers.
I'll be back in a few hours.
Let me know, I'll be ready to go.
Jake, hey.
So, how was Winterfest?
We nearly doubled what we made last year.
translation.es: Duplicamos lo ganado el año pasado.

translation.en: I told you Brooks was a financial genius.
translation.es: Brooks es un genio de las finanzas.

translation.en: And, how are things going with him?
Good, great.
We sorted out the job thing and now everything's perfect.
translation.es: Hablamos sobre la otra oferta. Todo está bien.

translation.en: I had a feeling you two would hit it off.
translation.es: Sabía que ustedes se llevarían bien.

translation.en: Yeah. I just don't know where he is right now.
translation.es: Sí. Aunque no sé dónde está ahora.

translation.en: -Any sign of Brooks? -No.
He's never been this late before.
Okay, that's it.
Something is not right.
Where are you going?
Well, I'll tell you where I'm going.
I am going to break out of my fortress and get some answers,
translation.es: Dejaré de lado mi orgullo. Iré a buscar respuestas.

translation.en: no matter what they might be, that's where I'm going.
translation.es: Ya sea algo bueno o algo malo, iré a averiguarlo.

translation.en: Yes, girl.
Papa Joel.
Kerrie! What a nice surprise. What brings you here?
translation.es: ¡Kerrie! Qué linda sorpresa. ¿Qué te trae por aquí?

translation.en: I thought everyone might need a break from all that candy.
translation.es: Pensé que querrían un poco de comida liviana.

translation.en: Is Brooks here?
No. Sorry.
-Papa Joel, do you have a minute? -For you, absolutely.
translation.es: - Papá Joel, ¿tiene un minuto? - Para ti, por supuesto.

translation.en: -Sit down. -Thank you.
I'm gonna miss these snowy winter days.
translation.es: Extrañaré el invierno y la nieve.

translation.en: Not to worry, you still have a few more months of snowy weather.
translation.es: No se preocupe. Tendremos nieve algunos meses más.

translation.en: Not where I'm moving.
You're moving?!
Yeah, didn't Brooks mention anything to you?
No, he did not.
Well, I don't think it's my place to…
translation.es: Bueno. Creo que no me corresponde…

translation.en: He's in Cincinnati at a business meeting,
translation.es: Está en Cincinnati, en una reunión.

translation.en: and if all goes well, we'll be relocating to California.
translation.es: Si las cosas salen bien, nos iremos a California.

translation.en: By the sounds of it, pretty soon too.
I don't understand.
Look, I don't know what happened between you two,
translation.es: Mira, no sé qué pasó entre ustedes,

translation.en: but there's one thing I do know…
translation.es: pero te diré lo que sé:

translation.en: when you get to my age, you won't regret the chances you took for love,
translation.es: a mi edad, no te arrepentirás de haberte arriesgado por amor,

translation.en: only the ones you let pass you by.
Do you know when he'll be back?
-Late afternoon. -Thank you.
Oh, and… please don't tell him we talked.
translation.es: Por favor, no le diga que hemos hablado.

translation.en: I won't.
Kerrie.
I want you to know…
I'm rooting for you.
Me too.
The only thing that's missing from this is your signature.
translation.es: Lo único que falta es tu firma.

translation.en: If you don't like the California campus, you can always work from here.
translation.es: Si no te gusta California, puedes trabajar desde aquí.

translation.en: No, no.
My dad's stoked for the sun and surf.
translation.es: Mi padre quiere sol y surf.

translation.en: I don't blame him.
-You're lucky to have him. -I am.
I've worked so hard my whole life, sacrificed everything to be successful.
translation.es: He trabajado duro toda mi vida para lograr ser exitosa.

translation.en: I think you and I are two of a kind.
These are from a client. Have one.
translation.es: Me los envió un cliente. Toma uno.

translation.en: Thank you.
What should I do with this?
Regift it?
It's starting to grow on me. [chuckles]
-[phone buzzing] -Oh, excuse me.
Murphy Candy & Gifts.
Hi.
How did you find me?
-Papa Joel. -Oh, yeah. Should have guessed.
translation.es: - Papá Joel me lo dijo. - Debí haberlo sabido.

translation.en: -Can we talk? -No, I don't think so.
I'm so sorry that this didn't work out, but…
translation.es: Lamento que esto no haya funcionado,

translation.en: I will sign any papers that you have.
translation.es: pero firmaré los papeles que tú quieras.

translation.en: Brooks, what are you talking about?
I'm talking about the loan documents.
translation.es: Hablo de la documentación para el préstamo.

translation.en: Unfortunately for you, I overheard you talking to the bank manager.
translation.es: Te escuché hablando con el gerente del banco.

translation.en: So, please, don't worry. I'm not going to cause any problems.
translation.es: Por favor, no te preocupes. No voy a causarte problemas.

translation.en: Brooks, is that what you thought?
That I would confront you about leaving me in the lurch
translation.es: ¿Que te pediría que no me dejases sola

translation.en: and go behind your back and get a secret loan to buy you out of the business?
translation.es: y solicitaría un préstamo a tus espaldas?

translation.en: I told Tim I don't want the loan.
translation.es: Le dije a Tim que no quería el préstamo.

translation.en: I had him cancel it.
Yes, at first I did want it, but…
translation.es: Sí, lo quise en un momento, pero…

translation.en: that was before I got to know you.
I had the contract in my hand…
translation.es: Tenía el contrato en mis manos.

translation.en: and I couldn't sign it.
-You didn't sign it? -No.
Why not?
It's because this restlessness that has driven me my whole life
translation.es: Porque esas ganas de mudarme todo el tiempo

translation.en: from place to place…
it's not here anymore.
It's gone.
Since I met you.
I guess I'm changing.
Well…
"Life is for the living, but…
he who's living must be prepared for changes."
translation.es: y debemos estar preparados para cambiar".

translation.en: Is that my high-school yearbook quote?
What about you? Why didn't you take the loan?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay sobre ti? ¿Por qué no aceptaste el préstamo?

translation.en: What changed your mind?
Well, I might have fallen in love with you.
translation.es: Quizás me haya enamorado de ti.

translation.en: You might have?
I have fallen in love with you.
And it's wonderful and terrifying because you know how I feel about change.
translation.es: Es hermoso y me da miedo. Sabes lo que pienso sobre los cambios.

translation.en: But I had to come and tell you.
And honestly, if you don't feel the same way, it's…
translation.es: Y, en verdad, si no sientes lo mismo…

translation.en: -I like it. -Me too.
I got something for you.
-What? -It's a surprise.
-[gasps] Two tickets to Belgium?! -That's right.
We're going back to the very little village
that your great grandparents learned to make candy.
translation.es: Allí donde aprendieron a elaborar dulces.

translation.en: Then we're going to see Jake and Ophelia and, of course, Megan.
translation.es: Luego, visitaremos a Jake, a Ophelia y a Megan, claro.

translation.en: I love you, Brooks McLead.
-I love you too, Bean. -[giggles]
